actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to temporarily waive the enrollment composition rule under the medicaid program for certain health maintenance organizations.

summary.text: Waives for contract periods beginning on July 1, 1996, and ending on July 30, 1998, with respect to facilities of HealthCare USA, Inc. and Ultramedix Health Care Systems Inc. in Florida, the requirement under the Social Security Act that Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries constitute less than 75 percent of the membership of a participating health maintenance organization.

titles.title: A bill to temporarily waive the enrollment composition rule under the medicaid program for certain health maintenance organizations.
